text: Kare (chichioya) wa itta. `Anata ga, moshi 8-nenkan watashi no tame ni hataraite kurereba, watashi wa 2-ri no musume no naka no 1-ri o, anata ni meawasetai. Moshi 10-nen o tsuiyashitainaraba, sore mo anata no o jiyu ni makaseyou. Watashi wa anata ni, murijii suru tsumori wanai. Arra ga o konominara, watashi ga tadashi ningendearu koto ga, anata ni mo wakarudeshou
